# [Interview #1158: OdysseyCon 2016, Entry #32](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1158#32)

#### Blightsong

Can you shed some light on why ruin's last words were "Vax".

#### Brandon Sanderson

No, I can't, I mean I can but I'm not going to.
